prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: Foundation details sheet with 12 numbered details covering new-to-existing concrete connections, epoxy anchor specifications, strongwall footings, LVL stringer connections, holdown post anchoring, retrofit bolt details, column-to-footing connections, and post base details. All epoxy connections reference Simpson SET-3G with special inspection required. APPROVED stamp by Anthony Montez - Building Plan Check, City of Long Beach, dated 10/29/25.
key_content: Detail 4: Strongwall connection — strongwall per plan, third rod A.B. per sheet 1/WSWH1, A.B. dia. + 1/2" hole, reinf. to match cont. ftg. (min. lap = 2'-0")
Detail 3: Column to footing / grade beam — column per plan, base plate per detail RSI, CL grade beam/ftg./column, ties per section per schedule, R/D hook typ.
Detail 2: Stirrup/reinforcement at existing slab — drill & epoxy w/ Simpson SET-3G (ICC-ES #4051) 6" min. embed, special inspection required, #3 rebar @ 32"
Detail 1: LVL stringer connection — 1-3/4" x 14" LVL stringer @ 12" O.C., 1/2" plywood, P.L. & A.B. @ 24" O.C., #3 rebar @ 36"

Detail 8: Existing stud wall at existing concrete — new-to-existing connection, dowels to match footing reinf. (2'-0" min. lap), drill & epoxy w/ Simpson SET-3G (ESR #4057) 6" min. embed, special inspection required, clean contact surfaces with wire brush, align bottom of footings
Detail 7: Epoxy dowel at existing footing — #8 dowels T.&B. lap 2'-0" min., column per plan tube or W.F., (E) footing for col. placement

Detail 6: Existing footing connection / thickened footing — thicken footing to provide 8" cover below soil, base P.L. & A.B. per 2/S3.4, drill & epoxy w/ Simpson SET-3G (LARR #25091) 6" min. embed, special inspection required, steel column per plan detail 2/S3.4

Detail 5: Sheathing / retrofit bolts at existing foundation — (E) 2x sill plate w/ 1/2" dia. Simpson retrofit bolts (RFB #840) w/ Simpson SET-3G epoxy (ICC#4057), spacing per shearwall schedule, 9" embedment, special inspection required
Detail 12: Post base / pedestal — enclosure per arch, pedestal size per arch on hardscape or paving
Detail 11: CB post base — #3 ties @ 8" max., 4-#4 vert. w/ std. hooks, optional const. jt. at CL ftg. & wall
Detail 10: Holdown post at existing slab — threaded rod (size per holdown), drill & epoxy Simpson SET-3G (ICC#4057), 10" embed for 5/8" dia. A.B.S., special inspection required

Detail 9: Sheathing at existing foundation — (E) 2x sill plate w/ 1/2" dia. Simpson retrofit bolts (RFB #840) w/ Simpson SET-3G epoxy (ICC#4057), spacing per shearwall schedule, 9" embedment, special inspection required
Simpson SET-3G epoxy: referenced in Details 2, 5, 6, 8, 9, 10 with ICC-ES #4051, ESR #4057, LARR #25091, ICC#4057
Simpson RFB #840 retrofit bolts: 1/2" dia., referenced in Details 5 and 9
Embedment depths: 6" min. (epoxy anchors in Details 2, 6, 8), 9" (retrofit bolts in Details 5, 9), 10" (5/8" dia. holdown rod in Detail 10)
Special inspection required for all epoxy anchor connections
APPROVED stamp: Anthony Montez — Building Plan Check, City of Long Beach, BLD032612R, dated 10/29/25
NOT SHOWN: footing dimensions (width x depth) — referenced as 'per plan'
NOT SHOWN: slab thickness and rebar schedule — referenced as 'per plan'
NOT SHOWN: foundation bolt max spacing and distance to ends
NOT SHOWN: concrete PSI and cement type
NOT SHOWN: vapor barrier notation

drawing_zones.content: Strongwall connection at new-to-existing footing — third rod A.B. per sheet WSWH1, reinf. to match cont. ftg., 2'-0" min. lap
Column to footing / grade beam — base plate, ties per schedule, R/D hook typ., CL grade beam
Stirrup/reinforcement at existing slab — Simpson SET-3G (ICC-ES #4051) 6" min. embed, #3 rebar @ 32"
LVL stringer connection — 1-3/4" x 14" LVL @ 12" O.C., 1/2" plywood, P.L. & A.B. @ 24" O.C., #3 @ 36"
Existing stud wall at existing concrete — new-to-existing, dowels to match footing reinf., Simpson SET-3G (ESR #4057) 6" min. embed
Epoxy dowel at existing footing — #8 dowels T.&B. lap 2'-0" min., column per plan tube or W.F., APPROVED stamp overlay (BLD032612R, 10/29/25)
Existing footing connection / thickened footing — 8" cover below soil, Simpson SET-3G (LARR #25091), steel column per plan detail 2/S3.4
Sheathing / retrofit bolts — Simpson RFB #840, 1/2" dia., SET-3G epoxy, 9" embedment, spacing per shearwall schedule
Post base / pedestal at arch — pedestal size per arch on hardscape or paving
CB post base — #3 ties @ 8" max., 4-#4 vert. w/ std. hooks
Holdown post at existing slab — threaded rod, Simpson SET-3G (ICC#4057), 10" embed for 5/8" dia.
Sheathing at existing foundation — Simpson RFB #840, SET-3G epoxy, 9" embedment, spacing per shearwall schedule
Title block — Ramirez Structural Inc, 326 Flint Ave, Long Beach CA 90814, Project 25-357, Sheet S4.0, Date 9/19/25
